title: AIIMS MBBS entrance exam 2017: Last date to apply is February 23 | education$career | Hindustan Times

organizations.name: all india institute of medical sciences

text:
AIIMS MBBS entrance exam 2017: Last date to apply is February 23 education Updated: Feb 22, 2017 15:52 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi File photo of AIIMS building in New Delhi. (Sanjeev Verma/HT photo) 
All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) has released online registration forms for the MBBS course at AIIMS, New Delhi, Patna, Bhopal, Jodhpur, Bhubaneshwar, Rishikesh and Raipur. 
The registration for applications which began on January 24 closes on February 23 at 5pm. 
Those who have passed/appearing/appeared in Class 12 exams with English, physics, chemistry and biology as their subjects are eligible to apply for the exam. They should have scored at least 60% marks for general category and 50% for SC/ST/OPH candidates can apply. 
The entrance examination will be held on May 28, 2017, at various centres across the country. The computer-based test will be conducted in two shifts - 9am to 12:30pm and 3pm to 6:30pm. Read more
